Missing variable is:
CMAKE_CPP_COMPILER

  No CMAKE_CPP_COMPILER could be found.

  Tell CMake where to find the compiler by setting the CMake cache entry
  CMAKE_CPP_COMPILER to the full path to the compiler, or to the compiler
  name if it is in the PATH.
